### Usage:

##### Upward Loop Function

    up( 0, 10, 1, function(i) {
        // Do something
    }, function() {
        // callback
    });

##### Downward Loop Function

    down( 10, 1, 2, function(i) {
        // Do something
    }, function() {
        // callback
    });

##### forEach Loop Function
 
    forEach( Array, function(k, v) {
        // Do something
    }, function() {
        // callback
    });
